word: God would have us turn away from the fashions and the foolishness of this world. He would have us be a blessing to the community in which we live. Every Christian should be a means of disseminating the light of God's Word. God has given us minds, that we may understand, and it is our duty and our privilege to live in harmony with Him and with the laws that He has established.--Ms. 115, 1907, pp. 1-3. ("Why We Have Sanitariums," October 20, 1907.)
